item.title: [PAYANT] Cults3d > javelin98 > 6mm_Imperious_Mj_lnir_Mobile_Fortress [non dl]
item.description:
Source : https://cults3d.com/en/3d-model/game/6mm-imperious-mjolnir-mobile-fortress

Id objet : 6mm-imperious-mjolnir-mobile-fortress

Prix : 2.69 euros

Collections :

  • epic superlourds SQUATS Squats-mjolnirs

Collections pour tags :

  • epic superlourds SQUATS Squats-mjolnirs NONDL NONSUP

Description :

1
2
3
4
5

Death From Below! The Imperious Republican Democratic Autocratic Pneumatic Psychotic Syphilitic Hegemony spans many worlds and encompasses many races of humans, demi-humans, and aliens. One such species are the Space Dwarves, who, because of some kind of sci-fi pseudo-babble, are half the size and twice the man as most of the IRDAPPSH's average citizens. Those same conditions also gave them Scottish accents, uncomfortably thick beards, and a strange obsession with art deco, but whatever.

Another of the Space Dwarf's strange obsessions is building things HUGE, much larger than necessary. It's possible they are overcompensating for something, but on the other hand, it's possible they are overcompensating for something. The Mjölnir Mobile Fortress is a huge armored crawler capable of carrying tanks, gyrocopters, and dozens of squat troops into battle. Armed with dozens of machine guns, antitank cannons, Gatling repeaters, anti-aircraft batteries, a siege mortar, and the patent-pending "Oh God Oh God We're All Gonna Die" siege cannon, which fires a slug the size of a Volkswagen, the Mjölnir can batter its way into any stronghold and wreak short, Scottish-accented havoc on the defenders within.

Note: This model is so big that I didn't bother making an 8mm version. It should work pretty well in both scales!

Space Dwarf Army 6mm Epic Scale

This army is work in progress, some things may be change and i have plan for add more models.
